text: Table 2. Calculations for predicted oxygen consumption® Definition Calculation Unloaded VO, VO, unloaded (mI.min'1) =150 + (6 x weight (kg)) Peak VO, female Peak VO, (ml.min™") Women = height (cm) — age (years) x 14 Peak VO, male Peak VO, (ml.min™") Men = height (cm) — age (years) x 20 Increment in work rate per (Watts.min™) = (Peak VO, —Unloaded VO,) / 100 minute
